original_title: Ethan Bortnick Live in Concert: The Power of Music
overview: The captivating family music special “Ethan Bortnick Live In Concert: The Power Of Music” features the amazing 12-year-old composer, pianist, and entertainer Ethan Bortnick, accompanied by a 50-piece orchestra, four-piece band, and the 120-member Kids Choir, in a program that had the live audience dancing in the aisles.  Presented by WTTW National Productions, this is a top concert special that matches the content of the touring live music show.
title: Ethan Bortnick Live in Concert: The Power of Music
